Text.val: // Author: Peter van der Veen ; created 28.06.2001
23.10.2014 SH SCR19259 Step2: Removed Test 5 - Check supply chain finance
03.02.2014 SH SCR18693 Step2: Changed range on INVO_ADMNO/CLNTNO, in case of SCF only on INVO_ADMNO
09.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Step2: Added Test 5 - Check supply chain finance
22.11.2013 SH SCR18538 Step1A: Added test on existing row in SFIN (task is now using DSQL)
10.07.2013 SH SCR18237 Added PI.IBANDEBTOR and PI.SWIFTDEBTOR and extended DCBA selection in BPH104BA
25.10.2012 GB SCR17633 BPH104BA/Step2: Extended test with INVO_MARKCODESPEC=GNRL_MARKCODDISPUTEGENERAL
Only if GSBU_YESNO(2031) = Y
11.10.2012 SH SCR17594 Step 1A: Removed tests on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE, indicator is now invoice number starts with 'PPA'
01.08.2012 SH SCR17479 Step A1: Undo change ( V.REFERENCE pos 1-10)
31.07.2012 SH SCR17479 Step A1: Reduced testing SFIP_REFERENCE = V.REFERENCE to pos 1-10 of virtual
09.07.2012 SH SCR17194 Excluded PO.DEBH_NO from reset event of all output parameters
09.07.2012 SH SCR17399 Extended v.Reference from alpha 10 to 20 (used for SCF check in step 1A)
30.04.2012 SH SCR17281 Added check if RF debtor is allowed for auto. payment handling
20.04.2012 SH SCR17268 Added special test for PL to skip auto. handling in case of admin = 7
14.03.2012 SH SCR17194 BPH104BA Added reset of all output parameters in case of every call
of BPH104BA
23.11.2011 SH SCR16808 BPH104BA Changed step 2 to leave BPH104 if multiple invoices with the same amount exists
19.09.2011 SH SCR16755 BPH104BA Added GSBU_TEXT(2031)='SM'/'MS' to define
the selection of invoices for auto. payment handling
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended SQL output parameter INVO_INVOICENO
to alpha 20
09.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Added PI.BANK_ADMNO and repalced CURR by CURA
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
18.11.2010 SH SCR15994 Step1A Changed test on SFIP (test now on SFIP_REFERENCE)
14.09.2010 SH SCR15742 Step5 Added test to leave BPH104 immed in case mult
invoices are found and INVO_AACTUALI = PI.AMOUNTPAYCURR
19.08.2010 SH SCR15725 Added PO.SFIP_NO and step 1A Check supply chain
15.12.2009 SH SCR15173 Changed logic to perform step 5 (BPH104BA), now always
if no auto. handling is possible via check on invoice numbers in step 2
05.11.2009 SH SCR14966 Redesigned BPH104BA and changed test 1/4 in step 3 of
BPH104, see SCR for more details
04.10.2009 GB SCR14955 Extended condition for the "differences are not allowed"
25.08.2009 SH SCR14729 Step5 Added PI.TESTBANKACCOUNT=Y to perform module
and removed test if program is running on i5
09.07.2009 SH SCR14729 Step5 Removed test 2 and changed program to
reset help variables on invoice level (before it was on debtor level)
16.12.2008 SH SCR14237 Disabled step4
07.01.2008 SH SCR13173 Replaced PK_FLBA by index X_CLBA_01
05.11.2007 SH SCR13034 Added PI.WKAACCOUNT and added test on new parameter
to perform step2 (see task SQL view); Step5 Extended test on INVO_PAYMENTCODE
for WKA account handling (uses test on GSET_PAYMENTCODE(103) now)
24.05.2007 SH SCR12561 Step7 Added test on BTPC_STATUS < 2
27.03.2007 SH SCR12349 Extended order by for INVO selections with
INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_DUEDATE
18.04.2006 SH SCR10936 Added BPH111.PI.DISCOUNTCREDITNOTES = N
11.04.2006 SH SCR10772 Added BPH038 to calculate if difference is allowed and
removed the hole part from BPH104 which was implemented to calc. differences
13.03.2006 SH SCR10619 Extended selection of INVO with "AND INVO_CODDRAFT = 'N'"
10.12.2005 SH SCR9538 Fixed bug acc. to PO.AUTOMATIC = N if GSET_YESNO = N (126)
and disabled step 5 for country "DE"
01.12.2005 SH SCR9538 Removed test GSET_YESNO = Y where GSET_ID=126 to perform
step 5 and extended step 5 to set PO.AUTOMATIC = N if GSET_YESNO = N
where GSET_ID=126 at the end
06.09.2005 SH SCR9010 Changed partial test to perform step 5 from GNRL_CODE = PL
to GSETYESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 126)
12.08.2005 SH SCR7828 Changed test 4 "Allowed payment difference " in step 5
to be the same as test 4 in step 2.
05.08.2005 SH SCR8473 Added test that "Test 3.2 (Credit restriction)" has to be
only performed if V.MAX_ALLOWED_CRR <> 0
12.07.2005 SH SCR8473 Added 3 new parameters PO.ALLOWEDCREDRESTR,
PO.ALLOWEDCREDRESTR, PO.WKA and the related update, also implemented
in step 5
14.02.2005 SH SCR7825 Extentded check to perform Test 4 "Allowed payment
difference" with "... and GSET_YESNO (77) <> 'N'"
28.10.2004 SH SCR7237 Added new test to the end of Step7; set PO.AUTOMATIC=N if
detected debtor heller is the debtor where all unallocated payments are booked
PO.DEBH_NO = GSET_QUANTITY (GEST_ID = 51)
10.05.2004 SH SCR6202 Skip further checks if PI.AMOUNTPAYCURR < 0 before
the check was PI.AMOUNTPAYCURR <= 0
08.03.2004 SH SCR5647 Removed test on BPIV with BPIV_INVO_NO =
- INVO_NO and BPIV_DATCASHREPORTDATE = NULL from Step 2
08.03.2004 SH SCR5647 Added new Step7, Check if invoice is already booked
02.03.2004 SH SCR5618 Step5 Added new test, that there are no invoices exists in
database for the detected invoice where INVO_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI are
the same, to dangerous for auto. handling, avoid to book the wrong invoice
03.02.2004 SH SCR5445 Step5 Changed selection of debtors from DEBB to BCBA
09.01.2004 SH SCR5210 Step6 Extended CND to perfrom Step 6 with GSET_YESNO = 'N'
- where GSET_ID = 24
19.12.2003 SH SCR5116 Step5 Fixed bug with condition to perform Step5, has be
- only done if PI.BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR <> blank and <> '0', before it was (or)
21.11.2003 SH SCR2404 Extended CND to perform STEP 5 with GNRL_CODE="PL"
- and activated this version of BPH104 for production
03.11.2003 SH SCR4615 Added STEP 6
15.10.2003 SH SCR4386 If more then 10 invoices were detected automatic handling
- is not possible
23.05.2003 SH SCR2040 Changed CND from V.MAXALLOWEDDISCOUNT <>0
- to V.MAXPOSSIBLEDISCOUNT <> 0, for the part Test3-Descicion table
07.05.2003 SH SCR3451 Diff. Changes, f.i some test only executed if BPH104
- is running on AS400
07.05.2003 SH SCR3472 Select proper keys for some tables
15.04.2003 SH SCR3330 Changed Test 4 according to SPECS
14.04.2003 SH SCR3281 CLNT312_MAXAMOUNT changed CLNT313_MAXAMOUNT
- and CLNT312_MAXPERCENTAGE changed in CLNT313_MAXPERCENTAGE
26.02.2003 SCR2404 SH Solved problems in STEP 5
10.12.2022 SCR2519 SH Add following additional selection to DSQL-STATEMENT
- NOT(EXISTS (SELECT BPIV_INVO_NO FROM bpiv WHERE
- BPIV_INVO_NO = INVO_NO))
05.11.2002 SCR2465 Reset all outgoing parameters if programs will be started
22.10.2002 SCR2403 SH Disabled step 5, it's not working properly
19.08.2002 SCR1852 SH Add new part in Step3/Test4 just above the block
- with V.MAX_ALLOWED_DISCOUNT = 0
-- Used for STEP 6
-- Output parameters from BPH038 - Test automatic paymenthandling
... PO.DEBH_NO is not reset frequently within BPH104, as done for the other output parameters. Also
if the auto. test fails, PO.DEBH_NO gives back the debtor where invoices are found
// If for any reason PO.AUTOMATIC='' we set this to 'N'
-- Check to perform further steps (2-7)
-- For WKA accounts step 2 has to be skipped, in this case step 5 has to be
performed (BSP104BA)
-- Set range on INVO_ADMN/CLNTNO, no test on client in case of SCF
... Check if automatic payment handling for RF debtors is allowed
-- Test to find invoices with bankaccount numbers
... in case of WKA handling
... if auto. payment handling is not possisble via step 2
... not if the bank account is not owned by the debtor
... not if the bank account is owned by the client
-- Determine how DCBA has to be selected
.. with bank account
... with IBAN
-- Final tests if auto. payment handling is possible
-- 1. Payment amount < 0, automatic handling not possible --> leave program
-- 2. Special test for PL, in case of admin = 7 --> leave program
-- 3. Check supply chain finance
-- Determine reference number
-- If a SCF inbound payment is found, auto. payment handing is possible -->
leave program
-- First try to find an invoice where invoice amunt = payment amount
... if not found try to find invoices where the sum of invoice amounts =
payment amount (testing 1 - 10 invoices)
-- First try to find try invoices where the sum of invoice amounts =
payment amount (testing 1 - 10 invoices)
... if not found try to find an invoice where invoice amunt = payment amount
... No automatic payment handling allowed with bankaccounts
... Check if automatic payment handling for RF debtors is allowed
... STEP 6 Check if the related debtor client for PI.INVO_01 is a legal
collection debtor, then automatic handling is not allowed
... STEP 7 Check if the detected PI.INVO_NO_1- 10 are already booked, then
automatic handling is not allowed
... check first detected invoice number
... check second detected invoice number
... check 3. until 10. detected invoice number
... Set PO.AUTOMATIC = FALSE because the detected debtor heller is the debtor
where all unallocated payments are booked.

ExpSyntax.val: '(A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,11},'4'))&' AND A.INVO_CLNTNO='&Trim(Str({0,12},'5'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,13},'4'))&' AND A.INVO_CLNTNO='&Trim(Str({0,14},'5'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,15},'4'))&' AND A.INVO_CLNTNO='&Trim(Str({0,16},'5'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,17},'4'))&' AND A.INVO_CLNTNO='&Trim(Str({0,18},'5'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,19},'4'))&' AND A.INVO_CLNTNO='&Trim(Str({0,20},'5'))&')'

'(A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,11},'4'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,13},'4'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,15},'4'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,17},'4'))&' OR A.INVO_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,19},'4'))&')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SFIP_NO, SFIP_ADMNO, SFIP_CLNTNO from :1/SFIP where SFIP_PAYMENTAMOUNT = :2 and SFIP_PAYMENTCURRENCY = ':3' and SFIP_DATEPAYMENTRECEIVED is null and trim(SFIP_REFERENCE) = ':4' and exists(select * from :1/SFIN where SFIN_INVO_NO > 0 and SFIN_SFIP_NO = SFIP_NO) for fetch only

Text.val: -- If at least one row exists set (End task condition = Yes/After)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.INVO_ADMNO, A.INVO_CLNTNO, A.INVO_DEBH_NO, A.INVO_CURRENCY, A.INVO_AACTUALI, A.INVO_DEBC_NO, A.INVO_INVOICENO, A.INVO_NO, A.INVO_DEBC_DEBC FROM :1/INVO A, :1/CURA WHERE (A.INVO_INVOICENO= ':2' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO= ':3' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':4' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':5' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':6' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':7' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':8' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':9' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':10' OR A.INVO_INVOICENO = ':11') AND A.INVO_AACTUALI<>0 AND A.INVO_CODDRAFT = 'N' AND A.INVO_PAYS_ID = 0 AND :12 AND A.INVO_CURRENCY = CURA_CODE AND CURA_ADMNO = :15 AND (A.INVO_CURRENCY = ':13' OR ':14' = 'Y' AND CURA_EUROCURR = 'Y') ORDER BY A.INVO_ADMNO, A.INVO_CLNTNO, A.INVO_DEBH_NO, A.INVO_CURRENCY, A.INVO_INVOICENO, A.INVO_INVDATE, A.INVO_AACTUALI, A.INVO_DUEDATE for fetch only

Text.val: individual invoices (virtuals from BPH 111) TEST3
-- reset variables
// We store DEBH_NO disregarding any tests; if we find any invoice for
// this client, it might be helpful to know the debh on desktop
-- If there are more then 10 invoices were detected, then automatic handling is
-- not possible, because we have only 10 output paramters for the detected
-- invoice numbers. (INFO: The invoices > 10 will be not booked by BPH106 in the
-- calling programs, so we get differences)
// test1 (payment without difference)
// test2 (payment > SUM_INVO_AACTUALI)
// test 3.0 (Allowed and not allowed discount)
... recalculate total amounts from BPH111 (INVO_CURRENCY --> V.PAYCURRENCY)
... test auto. payment handling
-- Test 4: Check if it's an allowed payment difference (only if PO.ALLPAYD <> 0)
... check if an open invoices exists where invoice amount < payment difference
.. auto. payment handling possible, becasue there exist no outstanding invoices
// step 4 Test if there are outstanding payment schedules, only if BPH104 is running on AS400
-- 16.12.2008 SH SCR14237 Disabled step4
-- END BLOCK --> V.CounterOnChangeString <=10
// update CounterOnChange for max 10 invoicenumbers
// test3 (totals for allowed and not allowed discount)
Fill 10 invoicenumbers max for every OnChangeString
sort on date
... select with bank account
... select with IBAN

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT B.INVO_ADMNO, B.INVO_CLNTNO, B.INVO_DEBH_NO, B.INVO_CURRENCY, B.INVO_AACTUALI, B.INVO_DEBC_NO, B.INVO_INVOICENO, B.INVO_NO, B.INVO_DEBC_DEBC, B.INVO_INVDATE FROM :1/DCBA A cross join :1/INVO B WHERE (A.DCBA_ADMNO = :2 AND A.DCBA_CLNTNO = :3 OR A.DCBA_ADMNO = :4 AND A.DCBA_CLNTNO = :5 OR A.DCBA_ADMNO = :6 AND A.DCBA_CLNTNO = :7 OR A.DCBA_ADMNO = :8 AND A.DCBA_CLNTNO = :9 OR A.DCBA_ADMNO = :10 AND A.DCBA_CLNTNO = :11) AND :12 AND B.INVO_DEBC_NO = A.DCBA_DEBC_NO AND :13 AND B.INVO_PAYMENTCODE = :14 AND B.INVO_CURRENCY=':15' AND B.INVO_CODDRAFT = 'N' ORDER BY B.INVO_DEBC_NO, B.INVO_INVOICENO, B.INVO_INVDATE, B.INVO_AACTUALI, B.INVO_DUEDATE for fetch only

Text.val: -- Payment cannot be handled automatically
-- Reset variables (in case we try to find invoices where the sum of
invoice amounts = payment amount)
-- If more then 10 were detected, set PO.AUTOMATIC = FALSE, because it's not
possible to handle more then 10 invoices (we have only 10 output parameter)
by the calling programs
-- Reset variables (in case we try to find an invoice where the invoice amount =
payment amount)
// We store DEBH_NO disregarding any tests; if we find any invoice for
// this client, it might be helpful to know the debh on desktop
-- Step 2: No other outstanding invoices with the same amount
First check if there are other invoices in database for the same debtor
client with the same invoice amount for the current selected invoice. If
exists then the selected invoice cannot be booked, because it's too
dangerous that the wrong invoice is booked.
-- Due to a SQL conversion error which happens in the following task, if the SQL
output parameter is used, we store the value from DSQL to a variable
-- In case mult invoices are found stop further testing and leave the whole program BPH104
-- Keep counter for max 10 invoices per debtor
-- Fill max 10 invoicenumbers for every Q.INVO_DEBC_NO
-- Variables is used in step 6 for legal collection tests
-- Step 3: Test if payment can be handled with the found invoice(s)
-- Test 1 : Payment without difference
-- Test 2 : Calculate allowed and not allowed discount
... test auto. payment handling
-- Test 3: Check allowed payment difference
... check if a open invoices exists where invoice amount <= payment difference
or invoices exists which are not booked. If invoices are found then it's too
dangerous to book the difference amount automatically.
-- Payment can be booked automatically
-- Stop testing on invoice level, go on with the next debtor
